ontologyFramework.OFErrorManagement.OFException

Class OFExceptionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ontologyFramework.OFErrorManagement.OFException.OFExceptionBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OFBuilderInterface

    public class OFExceptionBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements OFBuilderInterface
    This class build Exception from is ontological description, which is based in an individual Ex_Exception belonging to the class Exception. To do this individual must have the following proprieties: hasExceptionKill exactily 1 Boolean hasExceptionNotify exactly 1 Boolean hasExceptionBackTraceSteps exactly 1 Integer hasExceptionNotifier exactly 1 ExceptionNotifier hasExceptionMessage "error message"^^string Please refer to ExceptionData for more information about this entity.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Buoncomapgni Luca

    • Method Detail

      • buildInfo

        public void buildInfo(java.lang.String[] keyWords,
             OWLReferences ontoRef,
             OFBuildedListInvoker listInvoker)
        Description copied from interface: OFBuilderInterface
        Given references to the ontology, already initialized classes and key words it discover the ontology to retrieve information and initialize other classes. A call to this method should clear all stored variables that are used in OFBuilderInterface.getInitialisedClasses()
        Specified by:
        buildInfo in interface OFBuilderInterface
        Parameters:
        keyWords - retrieved by OFBuilderCommon.getKeyWords(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLNamedIndividual, OWLReferences)
        ontoRef - reference to the ontology which contains the builder individual
        listInvoker - references to already initialized classes from OFInitialiser

      • getInitialisedClasses

        public java.util.Map<?,?> getInitialisedClasses()
        Description copied from interface: OFBuilderInterface
        During initialization phase, OFInitialiser calls OFBuilderInterface.buildInfo(String[], OWLReferences, OFBuildedListInvoker) first and than retries the initialized Map from this method. Its returning value is add to the Map managed by OFBuildedListInvoker with key value given by OFBuilderCommon.getBuildedListName(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLNamedIndividual, OWLReferences).
        Specified by:
        getInitialisedClasses in interface OFBuilderInterface
        Returns:
        initialisedMap a Map which contains the initialized classes linked to a key (by default it is of type String}

      • clearInstanciateNotifier

        public void clearInstanciateNotifier()
